attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rangers FC are a blot on Scotland and the UK's footballing landscape. It is in the nation's interests that they cease to exist.

Countries, towns and cities across Europe that have been forced to endure a visit from the massed blue hordes will rejoice upon this action having been taken.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
